TestCase.name: query 1
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_select_all_order_v1 as select * from t order by v1;

RwStreamMaterialize(name=[t_select_all_order_v1], collation=[[0]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]])

TestCase.name: query 2
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_select_all_order_v2_v1 as select * from t order by v2 ASC, v1 DESC;

RwStreamMaterialize(name=[t_select_all_order_v2_v1], collation=[[1, 0 DESC]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]])

TestCase.name: query 3
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_select_v1_order_v2 as select v1 from t order by v2 DESC;

RwStreamMaterialize(name=[t_select_v1_order_v2], collation=[[1 DESC]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.3]])

TestCase.name: query 4
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_order_after_aggregation as select v1, C from (select v1, v2, avg(v3) as C from t group by v1, v2) order by C DESC;

RwStreamMaterialize(name=[t_order_after_aggregation], collation=[[1 DESC]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], c=[/(CAST($3):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $4)], v2=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($2)], agg#2=[COUNT($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]])

TestCase.name: query 5
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_order_limit as select * from t order by v1 limit 100 offset 10;

RwStreamMaterialize(name=[t_order_limit], collation=[[0]]) RwStreamSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC], offset=[10], fetch=[100]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[3]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2, 0.0.1.3]])
